column4: Boitamari - Pub Majeralga Gp ( vill- Iswarjhari Pt-2, Iswarjhari pt-1 NC, Dinnathpur,Bhutkura pt-3) | The River Brahmaputra causes severe erosion at Pub Majeralg GP. The erosion affected villages are- Iswarjhari Pt-2, Iswarjhari pt-1 NC, Dinnathpur,Bhutkura pt-3 3Dinnathpur. Approx. 4.68 hactor land has been eroded. 47 no.s family dismantle their houses.
